Reviews.Title: “Close to the Vatican, but is NOT a 4 Star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kbuck18
Reviews.Content: 1 12 star hotel standards apartment updated 70s walls paper sleep noise locks cabinets steal dishes bathroom horrible wore shower shoes gross feeling picky travelers bad bar soap provided towels rough thick sheets normal towels 1 guy running nice helpful 2 vatican

Reviews.Title: “It's an actual apartment. Kinda cute”
Reviews.Author: nikistevens
Reviews.Content: happy stay south france near friendly staff amazing spoke english professional walked advice surprised walked apartment bathroom guy single suite luck fitting shower people complained tripadvisor towels thin huge white clean stop crying babies little gated apt community local italians bring earplugs kinda loud cant hear street water tank gage youll bring own soap restaurants 5 mins touristy little walk 5 mins towards vatican hill restaurants gelato expensive compared paris little hard subway found american lived hotel walking distance train vatican location dont trains rome cheap 1 euro busses wifi 2 euros day tried wifi hard reliable pay theirs
